events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate, including a detailed resume and portfolio links.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster, specifically for the software developer role.
A specialist recruiter with experience in engineering roles was assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process.
Conducted an initial screening call to assess candidateâ€™s technical skills and cultural fit for the software engineering team.
Candidate responded promptly and expressed strong enthusiasm for the role and eagerness to proceed to the technical interview.
Scheduled a technical interview for the candidate with the lead software engineer, set to evaluate coding skills and problem solving.
The technical interview was successfully completed, with candidate demonstrating strong knowledge in software design and development.
HR interview was scheduled to further discuss cultural fit, compensation expectations, and other employment terms.
Completed HR interview where the candidate had a good discussion about company values and was aligned with the role's expectations.
Extended a formal job offer to the candidate for the software engineer position including salary and benefits package.
Received positive feedback from the candidate expressing excitement and satisfaction with the proposed offer and role.
Candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date with the HR team.
The onboarding process was initiated including system access setup, team introductions, and orientation scheduling.
Recruitment case successfully closed with the candidate hired and fully onboarded as a new software engineer in the company.
